mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (M_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NUMBER, PHONE, EMAIL, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD) VALUES (MEMBERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_name}, #{member_number}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{member_id}, #{member_pwd})
mapper.select: SELECT m.M_ID, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_PWD, m.MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBERS m WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}

SELECT m.M_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_NUMBER, m.PHONE, m.EMAIL, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_PWD, pi.PRODUCT_INFO_ID, pi.PRODUCT_ID, pi.JOIN_DATE, pi.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, pi.BALANCE FROM MEMBERS m LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_INFO pi ON m.M_ID = pi.M_ID WHERE m.M_ID = #{m_id}
